abstract: Uganda’s Parliament has voted to reopen a debate on a bill that seeks to outlaw homosexuality and that could be expanded to include the death penalty.
snippet: Uganda’s Parliament has voted to reopen a debate on a bill that seeks to outlaw homosexuality and that could be expanded to include the death penalty.
lead_paragraph: Uganda’s Parliament has voted to reopen a debate on a bill that seeks to outlaw homosexuality and that could be expanded to include the death penalty.

headline.seo: Anti-Gay Bill Is Revived in Uganda
